title: Preparedness, knowledge, and perception of nursing students about climate change and its impact on human health in India
content:
Publication date: March 2024

Source: Regional Sustainability, Volume 5, Issue 1

Author(s): Ramya Kundayi Ravi, Priya Baby, Nidhin Elias, Jisa George Thomas, Kathyayani Bidadi Veerabhadraiah, Bharat Pareek
